sqlMap.select: SELECT FACTID as factid, COMPOSITEID as compositeid, STUDENTID as studentid, SESSIONID as sessionid, ATTR1ID as attr1id, ATTR2ID as attr2id, ATTR3ID as attr3id, ATTR4ID as attr4id, ATTR5ID as attr5id, ATTR6ID as attr6id, ATTR7ID as attr7id, ATTR8ID as attr8id, ATTR9ID as attr9id, ATTR10ID as attr10id, ATTR11ID as attr11id, ATTR12ID as attr12id, ATTR13ID as attr13id, ATTR14ID as attr14id, ATTR15ID as attr15id, ATTR16ID as attr16id, GRADEID as gradeid, LEVELID as levelid, ORG_NODEID as orgNodeid, ASSESSMENTID as assessmentid, PROGRAMID as programid, CURRENT_RESULTID as currentResultid, SCALE_SCORE as scaleScore, PROFICENCY_LEVEL as proficencyLevel, NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT as normalCurveEquivalent, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE as nationalPercentile, POINTS_ATTEMPTED as pointsAttempted, POINTS_OBTAINED as pointsObtained, POINTS_POSSIBLE as pointsPossible, TEST_COMPLETION_TIMESTAMP as testCompletionTimestamp FROM LASLINK_COMPOSITE_FACT WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID = #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND COMPOSITEID = #compositeid:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO LASLINK_COMPOSITE_FACT ( FACTID, COMPOSITEID, STUDENTID, FORMID, SESSIONID, ATTR1ID, ATTR2ID, ATTR3ID, ATTR4ID, ATTR5ID, ATTR6ID, ATTR7ID, ATTR8ID, ATTR9ID, ATTR10ID, ATTR11ID, ATTR12ID, ATTR13ID, ATTR14ID, ATTR15ID, ATTR16ID, GRADEID, LEVELID, ORG_NODEID, ASSESSMENTID, PROGRAMID, CURRENT_RESULTID, SCALE_SCORE, PROFICENCY_LEVEL, NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE, POINTS_ATTEMPTED, POINTS_OBTAINED, POINTS_POSSIBLE, TEST_COMPLETION_TIMESTAMP ) VALUES ( #factid:NUMERIC#, #compositeid:NUMERIC#, #studentid:NUMERIC#, #formid:NUMERIC#, #sessionid:NUMERIC#, #attr1id:NUMERIC#, #attr2id:NUMERIC#, #attr3id:NUMERIC#, #attr4id:NUMERIC#, #attr5id:NUMERIC#, #attr6id:NUMERIC#, #attr7id:NUMERIC#, #attr8id:NUMERIC#, #attr9id:NUMERIC#, #attr10id:NUMERIC#, #attr11id:NUMERIC#, #attr12id:NUMERIC#, #attr13id:NUMERIC#, #attr14id:NUMERIC#, #attr15id:NUMERIC#, #attr16id:NUMERIC#, #gradeid:NUMERIC#, #levelid:NUMERIC#, #orgNodeid:NUMERIC#, #assessmentid:NUMERIC#, #programid:NUMERIC#, decode( sign( NVL(to_number( TO_CHAR( to_timestamp( to_char((select max(test_completion_timestamp) from laslink_composite_fact where sessionid != #sessionid:NUMERIC# and studentid = #studentid:NUMERIC# and assessmentid = #assessmentid:NUMERIC# and current_Resultid = 1 and compositeid = #compositeid:NUMERIC# ), 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS' ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3' ) ), 0) - to_number( TO_CHAR( to_timestamp( #testCompletionTimestamp:TIMESTAMP# ), 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3' ) ) ), -1, 1, 0, 2, 1, 2, 1 ), #scaleScore:NUMERIC#, #proficencyLevel:VARCHAR#, #normalCurveEquivalent:NUMERIC#, #nationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, #pointsAttempted:NUMERIC#, #pointsObtained:NUMERIC#, #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, #testCompletionTimestamp:TIMESTAMP# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE LASLINK_COMPOSITE_FACT SET FACTID = #factid:NUMERIC#, FORMID = #formid:NUMERIC#, ATTR1ID = #attr1id:NUMERIC#, ATTR2ID = #attr2id:NUMERIC#, ATTR3ID = #attr3id:NUMERIC#, ATTR4ID = #attr4id:NUMERIC#, ATTR5ID = #attr5id:NUMERIC#, ATTR6ID = #attr6id:NUMERIC#, ATTR7ID = #attr7id:NUMERIC#, ATTR8ID = #attr8id:NUMERIC#, ATTR9ID = #attr9id:NUMERIC#, ATTR10ID = #attr10id:NUMERIC#, ATTR11ID = #attr11id:NUMERIC#, ATTR12ID = #attr12id:NUMERIC#, ATTR13ID = #attr13id:NUMERIC#, ATTR14ID = #attr14id:NUMERIC#, ATTR15ID = #attr15id:NUMERIC#, ATTR16ID = #attr16id:NUMERIC#, GRADEID = #gradeid:NUMERIC#, LEVELID = #levelid:NUMERIC#, ORG_NODEID = #orgNodeid:NUMERIC#, ASSESSMENTID = #assessmentid:NUMERIC#, PROGRAMID = #programid:NUMERIC#, CURRENT_RESULTID = #currentResultid:NUMERIC#, SCALE_SCORE = #scaleScore:NUMERIC#, PROFICENCY_LEVEL = #proficencyLevel:VARCHAR#, NORMAL_CURVE_EQUIVALENT = #normalCurveEquivalent:NUMERIC#, NATIONAL_PERCENTILE = #nationalPercentile:NUMERIC#, POINTS_ATTEMPTED = #pointsAttempted:NUMERIC#, POINTS_OBTAINED = #pointsObtained:NUMERIC#, POINTS_POSSIBLE = #pointsPossible:NUMERIC#, TEST_COMPLETION_TIMESTAMP = #testCompletionTimestamp:TIMESTAMP# WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID = #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND COMPOSITEID = #compositeid:NUMERIC#

UPDATE LASLINK_COMPOSITE_FACT fact SET CURRENT_RESULTID = #currentResultid:NUMERIC# WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID != #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND (COMPOSITEID in (select COMPOSITEID from LASLINK_COMPOSITE_FACT where sessionid = #sessionid:NUMERIC# and studentid = #studentid:NUMERIC#) OR #currentResultid:NUMERIC# = 1) AND ASSESSMENTID = #assessmentid:NUMERIC# AND test_completion_timestamp = (select max(test_completion_timestamp) from laslink_composite_fact where sessionid != #sessionid:NUMERIC# and studentid = #studentid:NUMERIC# and compositeid = fact.compositeid and assessmentid = fact.assessmentid and test_completion_timestamp <= decode(#currentResultid:NUMERIC#, 1, sysdate, #testCompletionTimestamp:TIMESTAMP#))
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM LASLINK_COMPOSITE_FACT WHERE STUDENTID = #studentid:NUMERIC# AND SESSIONID = #sessionid:NUMERIC# AND COMPOSITEID = #compositeid:NUMERIC#
